name: Space Shooter (itch) (FiPlay)
description:
Space Shooter is an endless runner game genre shooter game, with a background in outer space where the player is required to survive from space enemy attacks that always follow and shoot.

Players can fight them by shooting them with laser weapons that can kill them, when the enemy dies the player will get a score, in this game there is also an item in the form of a potion, when the player gets the potion the player life will increase.

This game is designed for PC (Windows) platform and created using Unity Game Engine.
